column4: sometimes after so time of playing stuff, pulseaudio stops working and only crackling noise comes out. at that point playback accelerates and the timebar goes really fast in amarok
I'm not sure I've seen this particular failure mode, but pulseaudio is notorious for having problems.
rsync can be set up as a server for people to contact. Now that there are http server, this is less common than it used to be. See man rsync for details....
